name: Shooting Pool
description:
Shooting Pool is a relaxing billiard game made with HD graphics and realistic physics. You can feel all the 3D effects base on the “Augmented Reality”.
There are various schemes for the tables in Shooting Pool. You can collect numerous beautiful skins for the cues.
More than 1200 levels from simple to hard for you to relax in this game.
Come and play now! Fascinate yourself!
